channel.title: Deploy Application Development Profile on Weaveworks Introduction to GitOps w/ AWS EKS
channel.description: Recent content in Deploy Application Development Profile on Weaveworks Introduction to GitOps w/ AWS EKS

item.title: Deploy app-dev profile
item.description: EKSCTL_EXPERIMENTAL=true eksctl enable profile app-dev \ --git-url git@github.com:$GIT_ORG/${EKS_CLUSTER_NAME}-config \ --git-email $GIT_EMAIL \ --cluster $EKS_CLUSTER_NAME \ --region "$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION" mkdir -p $GITHUB_DIR/$GIT_ORG cd $GITHUB_DIR/$GIT_ORG git clone git@github.com:$GIT_ORG/${EKS_CLUSTER_NAME}-config.git cd ${EKS_CLUSTER_NAME}-config Wait a minute or two for flux to deploy applications, verify with ‘kubectl get pods -A’
